backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing FreeCaseReview entries in a Map with create, get, and list operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list describing required UI changes, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/landing/ActiveLa: Displays active lawsuits in cards with scroll reveal and a CTA scrolling to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/landing/ctaButto: Exports shared CSS classes for consistent primary CTA button styling.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with brand info, navigation links, social icons, and smooth‑scroll handlers.
frontend/src/components/landing/FreeCase: Form component for submitting case reviews with validation, mutation hook, and success view.
Renders a post-submission success screen showing next steps, optional reference ID, and contact options.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Displays the hero banner with legal consultation messaging, CTAs, stats, and a featured image.
frontend/src/components/landing/HowItWor: Shows a three-step explanation of the service process using cards and scroll‑reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes the full landing page layout, assembling hero, practice areas, lawsuits, how‑it‑works, and contact sections.
frontend/src/components/landing/Practice: Lists legal practice areas with icons and descriptions using animated cards.
frontend/src/components/landing/TopNav.t: Provides a sticky navigation bar with scroll‑to‑section links, mobile menu, and a CTA button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateFreeCaseRevi: Defines a mutation that maps form data to backend fields, generates a submission ID, and sends a review to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all reviews or a single review from an actor, handling loading and error cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: A hook that reveals an element when it enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver, respecting reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining base styles, USA-themed color variables, dark mode variants, and scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and responsive container settings using custom CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project state, requirements, styling notes, and known issues for the Sarah Legal one-page marketing site project.
